[blue]Reason: [reason]
[blue]Punishment ID: [id]

discord.gg/danismp

ERROR.connect.vpn.en-US:
DaniSMP.net - VPN DETECTED

[grey]It seems like you are using a [blue]VPN, Proxy or something else which hides your IP. This is not allowed on this server.

If you think, that this is a mistake or an error, please report it to an [red]Admin on our Discord Server!

discord.gg/danismp

[Flag: [blue][flag], ISP: [blue][isp], ASN: [blue][asn]]

Wenn du denkst, dass dies ein Fehler oder ein Irrtum ist, melde es bitte einem [red]Admin auf unserem Discord Server!
